channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Yellow sign time expired - Cray Valley Road, 20th June
item.description:
The yellow sign had been in place for almost 4 years. Perhaps it could be removed now. Cray Valley Road junction Sevenoaks Way.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cray Valley Road, Poverest, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dead branches, 20th June
item.description:
There are large dead broken branches just balancing dangerously from this tree ,needs attention ASAP

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Chislehurst Road, Crofton, London

item.title: Broken glass in road, 20th June
item.description:
Broken glass in road - 2 lots - one is outside the front of 105 Landells road and the other is outside the front door of 107 Landells road (which is actually in Goodrich road) There is also generally a huge amount of litter left by the recycling collectors strewn all the way down Landells road
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 104, Landells Road, East Dulwich, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping and council mess, 20th June
item.description:
The council contractors have left the green in an absolute mess. Grass has not been attended to in over 6 months. The skip is a massive nuisance and leaving mess behind everyday.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kellaway Road, Kidbrooke, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Gravel on footpath Cray Valley Road, 20th June
item.description:
Gravel is spilling onto the pavement and road from the land in front of the electrical structure in photograph attached. There is no edging to keep it in place. Cray Valley Road, Sevenoaks Way end.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cray Valley Road, Poverest, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 2 cars parked in all way, 20th June
item.description:

item.title: Illegal advertising sign + clutter on footway 102 and 104 Kingsland high street E8, 20th June
item.description:
An illegal advertising sign obstructs the footway outside 102 Kingsland high street, E8. The "goods" displayed by the trader at 104 Kingsland high street are taking up more of the footway than designated in its permit. This footway is narrow and busy.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Kingsland High Street, Hackney, London

item.title: Very dangerous thick sharp tree branch, 20th June
item.description:
Very dangerous thick tree branches at head hight on the main part of the pavement. Needs to be cut down asap. Many residents are hitting their head on it. It is at eye hight and could cause easily a catastrophic injury to someone.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 38, Tyrrell Road, East Dulwich, London
Report on FixMyStreet

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Seal Street, Hackney, London

item.title: Caretaker, 20th June
item.description:
We pay a service charge for WHAT?? Your roster for cleaning is not being followed by no body lifts moped once a week if that lobbies not cleaned walkways not swept all that happens is the rubbish gets collected Reported quit a few times now so can management take a visit please

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Attlee Road, Thamesmead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: St Olave's Estate door glass broken, 20th June
item.description:
The glass panel of the communal entrance door on the north of the St Olave's Estate building has been smashed, leaving a potential danger to anyone using the door.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Tooley Street, The Borough, London
